_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Blockland
author: xanderian101@hotmail.com
description: Blockland dedicated server hosted through wine

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# The wine generic server installer
# This will just pull a download link and unpack it in directory if specified.

apt update -y
apt install -y curl file unzip wine

if [ ! -d /mnt/server ]; then
    mkdir -p /mnt/server/
fi

cd /mnt/server/

curl -sSL https://blockland.us/files/BlocklandPortable.zip -o BlocklandPortable.zip

# unpack servver files
FILETYPE=$(file -F ',' BlocklandPortable.zip} | cut -d',' -f2 | cut -d' ' -f2)
unzip BlocklandPortable.zip
rm BlocklandPortable.zip

variables.name: Dedicated Server Token
variables.description: The authentication token for you to host dedicated servers.

variables.name: Max Player Count
variables.description: Maximum amount of players allowed on the server

variables.name: Server Password
variables.description: The password to connect to the server

variables.name: Admin Password
variables.description: The password to login as an admin
